Title: Root Path
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), David Slack, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story editor), Michael Sopczynski (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: The Machine tasks Root to find a janitor who has a mysterious past. However, when her presence endangers him, the Machine sends his number to Finch as well.
